Assets.SUB_SERVICE_DESCRIPTION[StarQ Int: Custom subway system that can intersect with any roads.
Assets.DESCRIPTION[StarQ IntersectableSu: Single track that allows subway train traffic to run in one direction.
Single track that allows subway train traffic to run in both direction.
Double track that allows subway trains to run in one direction.
Double track that allows subway trains to run in both directions simultaneously.
Allows passengers subway train boarding and disembarking underground.
Allows passengers subway train boarding and disembarking overground.
Allows passengers subway train boarding and disembarking overground.
Allows passengers subway train boarding and disembarking from an elevated station.
Allows passengers subway train boarding and disembarking from an elevated station.
Rail yard that contains warehouses and facilities for subway train handling and maintenance.
